Solar Panel: Incorporate a small solar panel on the backpack to recharge electronic devices on the go.
Air Purifying Filter: Add an air purifying filter to the backpack to improve air quality and remove pollutants.
LED Lighting: Install LED lights on the backpack to provide visibility and light during nighttime activities.
Water Bottle Holder: Include a water bottle holder to keep drinks accessible and prevent spills.
USB Charging Ports: Add USB charging ports to the backpack to charge multiple devices at once.
